forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: when starts then all parts face nearest dropped item

comments.text: having some sort of script to look at the nearest item just laying on the groung would be cool
thanks for the suggestion! sounds useful!
something to face downwards, without locking rotation around the vertical axis, would also be nice to have. useful for simulating gravity.
use all parts face up and flip your center part 180. we've been using it like that fine for years.
sorry, i might have been unclear. up vs down wasn't the important part. the part about rotation on the vertical axis is what i meant.

thread.latestCommentText: sorry, i might have been unclear. up vs down wasn't the important part. the part about rotation on the vertical axis is what i meant.
